trans-unit.source: Represents a legend item, which is stored in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个图例项，它存储在<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The LegendItem class represents a legend item, which can be either a default or custom item: - Default legend items are automatically inserted into the legend for either data series or data points.
trans-unit.target: LegendItem 类表示一个图例项，它可以是默认或自定义项:-默认图例项自动插入到数据序列或数据点的图例。

trans-unit.source: Default entries for pie and doughnut charts represent the plotted data points, whereas entries for all other chart types represent the plotted series.
trans-unit.target: 饼图和圆环图的默认条目表示绘制的数据点，而所有其他图表类型的条目表示所绘制的系列。

trans-unit.source: By default, these legend entries use the data point or series color for the symbol color, and the name of the series or data point for the legend item text.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，这些图例项使用的数据点或一系列颜色符号颜色，以及图例项文本的系列或数据点的名称。

trans-unit.source: Default legend items can be customized or deleted at run time by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: 默认图例项可以自定义或通过使用在运行时删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: - Custom legend items have user-defined text, symbol color, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: -自定义图例项都具有用户定义的文本、 符号颜色和等。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the default entries, they are not connected with the plotted data.
trans-unit.target: 默认值与项目不同，在未连接与绘制的数据。

trans-unit.source: Custom legend items can be added at either design time or run time, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> object.
trans-unit.target: 设计时或运行的时，可以在添加自定义图例项使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Legend symbols can be rectangles, lines or markers, depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property setting of a LegendItem object.
trans-unit.target: 图例符号可以是矩形、 线条或标记，具体取决于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>是 LegendItem 对象的属性设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text of a custom legend item is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 自定义图例项的文本由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Name%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Note that you can also add custom legend items using the `Add` and `Insert` methods associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A> collection property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> object.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，你还可以添加自定义图例项使用`Add`和`Insert`与关联的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>集合的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref> class with the specified name, color and image path.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref>类具有指定名称、 颜色和图像路径。

trans-unit.source: Only the `image` or `color` parameter needs to be specified.
trans-unit.target: 仅`image`或`color`参数需要指定。

trans-unit.source: If both are specified, the `image` parameter has precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时指定了，`image`参数具有优先级。

trans-unit.source: The name of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: 图例项的名称。

trans-unit.source: The color of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: 图例项的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The path of the image to be displayed for the legend item.
trans-unit.target: 图例项显示的图像的路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项背景渐变的方向。

trans-unit.source: Also determines whether a gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: 此外确定是否使用渐变。

trans-unit.source: Use the BackGradientStyle property to determine whether a title will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used.
trans-unit.target: BackGradientStyle 属性用于确定是否标题将显示渐变，并以确定渐变的方向，如果一个使用。

trans-unit.source: This property is only implemented if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅实现此属性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available patterns, refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关可用模式的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle>

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A> property to set the primary color.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用渐变颜色:-使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A>属性来设置主要颜色。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the BackGradientStyle property to set the secondary color.
trans-unit.target: -使用 BackGradientStyle 属性设置辅助颜色。

trans-unit.source: - Use this BackGradientStyle property to set the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: -使用此 BackGradientStyle 属性可设置所需的渐变样式。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration that specifies the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>指定图例项背景渐变的方向的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项的阴影样式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>枚举指定的类型<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>画笔使用阴影图案</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background.
trans-unit.target: 阴影图案由纯色背景色和背景上绘制的直线组成。

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关可用的阴影样式的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The color of hatching lines is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 阴影行的颜色由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration that specifies the hatching style of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>枚举，它指定图例项的阴影样式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color which will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在其中绘制背景图像时将替换透明颜色的颜色。

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that will be displayed as transparent when the background image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>时，将显示为透明绘制背景图像的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项的辅助颜色。

trans-unit.source: The BackSecondaryColor property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of many <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objects; it is used when gradient colors are being applied.
trans-unit.target: BackSecondaryColor 属性是确定的许多辅助背景色的多个相关属性之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>对象; 在应用渐变颜色时使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: This property is only implemented if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅实现此属性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set BackSecondaryColor to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 BackSecondaryColor 设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。

trans-unit.source: If hatching is used, the BackSecondaryColor property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend item.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用阴影，则 BackSecondaryColor 属性确定图例项阴影线的颜色。

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors for a legend cell's background: To use gradient colors: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A> property to set the primary color.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用图例单元格的背景的渐变颜色︰ 若要使用渐变颜色:-使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A>属性来设置主要颜色。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to set the secondary color.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A>属性来设置辅助颜色。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to set the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A>属性来设置所需的渐变样式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>用于带阴影或渐变填充背景辅助颜色值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you use a marker for a custom legend item.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果为自定义图例项使用一个标记。

trans-unit.source: this property will set the border color of the marker.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将设置标记的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerBorderColor%2A> property is also set, its value has precedence.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerBorderColor%2A>也设置属性，其值的优先级。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerBorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the border color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>用于绘制的边框颜色的图例项的值。

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the line style used for a border.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定用于边框的线条样式。

trans-unit.source: The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 行可以是实体、 线和等。

trans-unit.source: For other border styles, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关其他边框样式，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>枚举主题。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value that determines the border style of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref>枚举值，该值确定图例项的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: The BorderWidth property can also be used to set the width of lines when, for example, custom legend items are displayed with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> style.
trans-unit.target: BorderWidth 属性还可以用于设置线条的宽度时，例如，将自定义图例项显示与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>样式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>

trans-unit.source: **Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of cells in the legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取图例项中的单元格的集合。

trans-unit.source: A legend item consists of one or more legend cells, each represented by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> object and stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 图例项包含一个或多个图例单元格，每个表示的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象，并存储在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是适用于整个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection"></xref> object that represents the collection of cells in the legend item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection"> </xref>表示图例项中的单元格的集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项的颜色。

trans-unit.source: This Color property is one several related properties that get or set the color of many chart elements; it can be set to any ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 此颜色属性是一个多个相关属性用于获取或设置的许多图表元素，则颜色它可以设置为任何 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set for both a data point and its series, the data point color will have precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为数据点和其系列，数据点颜色将具有优先权。

trans-unit.source: The series color will only be used for data points that do not define their own color.
trans-unit.target: 仅将不会定义自己的颜色的数据点使用序列颜色。

trans-unit.source: If a custom legend item uses a marker, this property will determine the marker color.
trans-unit.target: 如果自定义图例项使用一个标记，此属性将确定标记颜色。

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A> property is set, its value then has precedence.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A>属性设置为，其值，则具有优先级。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property will be ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Image%2A> property specifies an image to be used for the legend item symbol.
trans-unit.target: 将忽略此属性，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Image%2A>属性指定要用于图例项符号的图像。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that is used to draw the legend item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>用于绘制图例项的值。

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the legend item is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，指示是否启用图例项。

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是适用于整个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the legend item is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用了图例项;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that will be displayed for a legend item symbol.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将图例项符号显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: This property determines the image file to be used for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> symbol.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定要用于的图像文件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>符号。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: The path can be an absolute or a relative URL.
trans-unit.target: 路径可以是绝对或相对 URL。

trans-unit.source: If you set a background image, that image will be displayed regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置背景图像时，会显示该图像而不考虑<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>属性设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackImageTransparentColor%2A> property to enable one color used by the image to appear transparent.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>属性来启用图像显示为透明所使用的一种颜色。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackImageTransparentColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of an image file.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示的图像文件的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display style of the legend item image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项图像显示样式。

trans-unit.source: These styles determine how the item's corresponding symbol will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 这些样式确定如何将显示项的相应的符号。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> style can be combined with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> style.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>可以与组合样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>样式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, first set the ImageStyle property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成此操作，首先设置到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> ImageStyle 属性

trans-unit.source: Then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImage%2A> property to specify a marker image, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to specify a marker style.
trans-unit.target: 然后使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImage%2A>属性指定一个标记映像，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>属性指定的标记样式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resulting symbol will be a combination of a line and an image or marker.
trans-unit.target: 生成的符号将是一条线的图像或标记的组合。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle"> </xref>枚举值，指定图例项图像显示样式。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref>与此图例项关联的对象。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref>与此图例项关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的标记的边框颜色，如果使用。

trans-unit.source: To use markers, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用标记，请设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>以外的值的属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that markers will not be applied to pie, doughnut, and any stacked chart types.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将不会标记应用到饼图、 圆环图，以及任何堆积图表类型。

trans-unit.source: For custom legends, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A> property will also set the border color of markers.
trans-unit.target: 对于自定义图例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A>属性也将设置标记的边框颜色。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MarkerBorderColor property setting has precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: MarkerBorderColor 属性设置均优先于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A>属性设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的标记的边框宽度，如果使用。

trans-unit.target: 以像素度量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is one (1) pixel.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一 （1） 像素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的标记颜色，如果使用。

trans-unit.target: 默认颜色是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a marker image of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项标记图像。

trans-unit.source: Represents a path to an image file, which can be an absolute or relative URL.
trans-unit.target: 表示到图像文件，它可以是绝对或相对 URL 路径。

trans-unit.source: To use markers, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用标记，请设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>以外的值的属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MarkerImage property takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: MarkerImage 属性优先于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A>

trans-unit.target: 标记图像可以是任何支持的.NET Framework，包括图标的有效图形文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置绘制标记图像时将替换透明颜色的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The MarkerImageTransparentColor property is used to select one color in a marker image that will be displayed as transparent.
trans-unit.target: MarkerImageTransparentColor 属性用于将显示为透明标记图像中选择一种颜色。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents an ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>表示绘制标记图像时将替换透明颜色 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝） 颜色值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the legend item markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的大小的图例项标记，如果使用。

trans-unit.source: To use markers, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用标记，请设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>以外的值的属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that markers will not be applied to data points of pie, doughnut and any stacked chart types.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，标记将不应用于饼图、 圆环图和堆积的图中的任何类型的数据点。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> expression that represents the height and width of the plotting area of markers, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>表示的高度和宽度的标记，以像素为单位的绘图区的表达式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 5 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 5 个像素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a legend item marker style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项标记样式。

trans-unit.source: Also used to enable or disable the display of markers.
trans-unit.target: 此外用于启用或禁用标记的显示。

trans-unit.source: To disable markers, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 禁用标记，此属性设置为以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A MarkerStyle integer enumeration that specifies a legend item marker style.
trans-unit.target: 指定图例项标记样式 MarkerStyle 整数枚举。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示图例项的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the legend item separator.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项分隔符的颜色。

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是适用于整个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the color of the legend item separator.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>用于绘制图例项分隔符的颜色的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>。</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the separator style of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项的分隔符样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the separator style of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"> </xref>枚举值，指定图例项的分隔符样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的名称<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref>默认图例项的关联。

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event, to determine which data series a default legend entry represents.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅应在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>事件，以确定默认图例项表示的数据系列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: The SeriesName property applies to all charts except pie and sphere charts; their default legend items correspond to plotted data points, and not to plotted series.
trans-unit.target: 系列名称 分类属性适用于饼图和球体图; 之外的所有图表其默认图例项对应绘制数据点，而不是绘制序列。

trans-unit.source: When you deal with pie and sphere charts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 当你处理饼图和球体图时，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>属性改为。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property should not be set by the developer.
trans-unit.target: 不应由开发人员设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是适用于整个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that determines the name of the series associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值确定默认图例项的关联的序列的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为零长度字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> object associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref>默认图例项的关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> object that is represented by a default pie or sphere chart legend entry.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅应在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>事件，以确定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>默认饼图或球体图表图例条目表示的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: Chart types other than pie or sphere charts will return a negative one (-1), because the default legend items correspond to plotted series, and not plotted data points.
trans-unit.target: 图表类型而非饼图或球体图将返回负一 (-1)，因为默认图例项对应绘制序列，并且不会绘制数据点。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName%2A> property for these chart types.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName%2A>属性用于这些图表类型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property should not be set by the developer.
trans-unit.target: 不应由开发人员设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是适用于整个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the location of the default legend's associated data point in a zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>表示默认图例的位置的值关联的从零开始的索引中的数据点。

trans-unit.source: All chart types except for pie and doughnut charts will return a negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: 所有图表类型除外饼图和圆环图将返回负一 (-1)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项的阴影颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow color of several chart elements, and can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置几个的阴影颜色图表元素，并且可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。

trans-unit.source: The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try using a color of "128,0,0,0" for shadows.
trans-unit.target: Alpha 值可以用于实现"真实"隐藏作用;请尝试使用"128,0,0,0"的一种颜色的阴影。

trans-unit.source: To implement a shadow, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ShadowOffset%2A> property to a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 若要实现阴影，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ShadowOffset%2A>为零 (0) 以外的值的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ShadowOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the shadow color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值，该值表示图例项的阴影颜色。

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置阴影偏移量，以像素为单位，图例项。

trans-unit.source: To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 若要实现阴影，请使用零 (0) 以外的值。

trans-unit.source: A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right.
trans-unit.target: 正值将导致阴影向下和向右移动。

trans-unit.source: A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.
trans-unit.target: 负值将导致阴影向上和向左移动。

trans-unit.source: **Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**此属性是仅适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>的其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the relevant chart element.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>表示阴影偏移量，以像素为单位的相关图表元素的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tooltip of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图例项的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以设置要显示不同类型的与图表相关的数据的特殊关键字。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Keywords [rs_vsDataVis]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[关键字 [rs_vsDataVis]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性是适用于整个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the tooltip for the legend item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示图例项的工具提示。
